review: Great device, works fast and as I expected
author: Rich "drawdy10"

review: Great product to pair with your android phone or tablet.  Works seamlessly and is great for parties (YouTube queue).Only con is it can't power itself through hdmi..... oh well.
author: Tim

review: Excellent for what it's intended for. Stream videos and photos from any device you have whether it's a laptop or a phone and also connects to your Google drive and photos so the back ground will display your photos which is great.
author: Eric M Seward

review: I own several of these throughout my home. Amazing product that works without fail. Thanks Google!
author: Kyle

review: Needs to improve casting some apps takes forever specially Netflix. I always end up casting from my phone which is faster. Too expensive for what it is. Nothing special about it.
author: Xime

review: Good if you have STRONG internet, it requires 2 devices to be online, and mirroring content takes more data. I bought a Fire TV Stick and that works much better on my connection.
author: AmazonJunkie "Conrro3"

review: I don't really see the point of this product if I can only use it with chrome...
author: Margaret Lengerich
